problem.p: For all the classifications, an accuracy of over 0.7 was achieved, which illustrated that with only simple unigram features a good model, was able to be learnt for the individual MOOC course.
Which algorithm would you select to build models for the cross-MOOC classification evaluation?

choicegroup.label: Which algorithm would you select to build models for the cross-MOOC classification evaluation?
choicegroup.choice: Support Vector Machine with an RBF Kernel

div.p: The best performing algorithm was the Support Vector Machine using a RBF kernel, which was then selected to build models for the cross-MOOC classification evaluation.
